tag_list: comments, recomments, opinion, express, discuss, share, critic, review, open-letter, annoyance-of-the-day
overview:
commentate.me is a web-platform for people to express and share their opinion and make their voice heard.

Visitors can read and discuss othersâ€™ comments or contribute with their own opinion on anything that excites, concerns or bothers them. Also they can let others re-comment on their opinion.

The website is clustered into classical news sections and categories, as there are politics, business & finance, sports, technology & science, fashion & design, entertainment, health and travel. On top there are three special categories to express opinions:

1 - the annoyance of the day, where users can quickly state what irks them and share it with other readers.

2 - open letters, for people who like to get a strong message across.

3 - reviews, for recommendations on on events, media, exhibitions etc. (but no hotel reviews!).

This category is planned to be expanded in the future with some new sections that are in the pipeline.

The service on commentate.me is free of charge. But to write comments and reply with reComments, users need to register with commentate.me.
